      • UI_TYPE_CLUSTER_NONE

        public static final int UI_TYPE_CLUSTER_NONE
        When the client reports ClusterHome state and if there is no UI in the sub area, it can reports UI_TYPE_CLUSTER_NONE instead.

      • reportState

        public void reportState(int uiTypeMain,
                        int uiTypeSub,
                        byte[] uiAvailability)
        Reports the current ClusterUI state.
        参数:
        uiTypeMain - uiType that ClusterHome tries to show in main area
        uiTypeSub - uiType that ClusterHome tries to show in sub area
        uiAvailability - the byte array to represent the availability of ClusterUI. 0 indicates non-available and 1 indicates available. Index 0 is reserved for ClusterHome, The other indexes are followed by OEM's definition.

      • requestDisplay

        public void requestDisplay(int uiType)
        Requests to turn the cluster display on to show some ClusterUI.
        参数:
        uiType - uiType that ClusterHome tries to show in main area

      • getClusterState

        public ClusterState getClusterState()
        Returns the current ClusterState.

      • startFixedActivityModeAsUser

        public boolean startFixedActivityModeAsUser(Intent intent,
                                            Bundle options,
                                            int userId)
        Start an activity as specified user. The activity is considered as in fixed mode for the cluster display and will be re-launched if the activity crashes, the package is updated or goes to background for whatever reason. Only one activity can exist in fixed mode for the display and calling this multiple times with different Intent will lead into making all previous activities into non-fixed normal state (= will not be re-launched.)
        参数:
        intent - the Intent to start
        options - additional options for how the Activity should be started
        userId - the user the new activity should run as
        返回:
        true if it launches the given Intent as FixedActivity successfully

      • stopFixedActivityMode

        public void stopFixedActivityMode()
        The activity launched on the cluster display is no longer in fixed mode. Re-launching or finishing should not trigger re-launching any more. Note that Activity for non-current user will be auto-stopped and there is no need to call this for user switching. Note that this does not stop the activity but it will not be re-launched any more.

      • onCarDisconnected

        protected void onCarDisconnected()
        从类复制的说明: CarManagerBase
        Handle disconnection of car service (=crash). As car service has crashed already, this call should only clean up any listeners / callbacks passed from client. Clearing object passed to car service is not necessary as car service has crashed. Note that Car*Manager will not work any more as all binders are invalid. Client should re-create all Car*Managers when car service is restarted.
        指定者:
        onCarDisconnected 在类中 CarManagerBase
